body_html:
pytorch gets installed when I build the docker image (simply execute docker built -t pytorch ., after cloning the repo).

This part in the readme:

Docker image

Dockerfile is supplied to build images with cuda support and cudnn v6. Build as usual

docker build -t pytorch .

body:
pytorch gets installed when I build the docker image (simply execute docker built -t pytorch ., after cloning the repo).

This part in the readme:

Docker image

Dockerfile is supplied to build images with cuda support and cudnn v6. Build as usual

docker build -t pytorch .
